::KitKat::

She looked at DrillBit.  She shook and looked into his eyes.  She had 
the look of confusion on her face. "Drill..Drillbit?"

She fell to her knees and held her head with her hands.
"What's wrong with me?"  Her whole body shook and trembled.
She starts to cry uncontrollably.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit was having a hell of a time holding KitKat, then came the
> punch.
> "Outch!" He let go.
> "Hey KitKat, that hurt." He then relized what was going on. He 
grabed
> her, with a little more forc, by the shoulders, making her look him 
in
> the eye.
> "KitKat! Its me, DrillBit! Calm down, love!" He said.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 watched it all from a distance, seeing what was going on. He 
almost
> laughed when KitKat punched DrillBit. He was waiting for the right
> momeant to strike.
